page.title: 04ONE BARNSTON SCHOOLDAY
page.content: ONE DAY IN THE LIFE OF DAVID,11 years. { {7.13.}Woke up,read book,Vlad The Drac. {8.20.}Breakfast-cornflakes,toast with honey,orange juice. {8.45.}Leave for school.With Richard. {9.25.}Into assembly watched Mrs.Clegg's play.Ruth and Naomi. {9.55.}Practical Maths,about bearings. {10.40.}Playtime.Played football. {10.55.}Finish practical maths. {12.15.}Lunch.Peanut butter sandwiches,crisps and an apple. {1.25.}Made gonks for Summer Fair. {2.35.}Playtime.Talked with friends. {2.50.}Began writing this. {3.55.}Went home,watched T.V. {5.45.}Had tea,shepherds pie with peas. {9.00.}Had bath,washed my hair. {9.30.}Read Vlad The Drac. {9.50.}Went to sleep.
